messages.content: What is the specialty of ComfyUI-InstructIR?
ComfyUI-InstructIR specializes in image restoration using human instructions, excelling in tasks such as denoising, deblurring, deraining, and enhancing overall image quality.
How can I install ComfyUI-InstructIR for my projects?
To integrate ComfyUI-InstructIR into your projects, you need to run 'git clone https://github.com/zhongpei/ComfyUI-InstructIR custom_nodes/ComfyUI-InstructIR' in your custom_nodes directory.
What is the process of crafting instructions for InstructIR?

InstructIR understands a wide range of human prompts for image restoration. Write clear instructions that specify the desired enhancement, such as 'denoise', 'deblur', 'dehaze', or 'derain', and InstructIR will execute the command accurately.

Yes, InstructIR is capable of handling ambiguous instructions like 'clear up the mess', 'make it look good', or 'make it pop' and will attempt to improve the image based on its understanding of the prompt.
What are some example prompts for specific image restoration needs?

For denoising, you can use prompts like 'help me reduce the fuzziness in this image' or 'clean up this noisy image, itâ€™s an eyesore'. For deblurring, use 'please, clean up this blurry photo' or 'deblur my picture, it's too fuzzy'. For deraining, try 'I want to eliminate the water from this image' or 'clear the rain from my picture'.
Yes, InstructIR supports super resolution (SR) enhancement. You can use prompts like 'enhance the size and quality of this image' to improve your image's size and clarity.
What are some prompts for low-light enhancement in InstructIR?

For low-light (LOL) enhancement, you can use prompts such as 'I took this photo during the night, enhance it' or 'can you make the image brighter?'. InstructIR will work to improve the exposure and brightness of your image.
Can InstructIR improve the overall quality of an image?

Yes, InstructIR supports general enhancement. You can use prompts like 'make my image look like DSLR quality' or 'can you edit this to look like an award-winning photo?' to improve the overall quality of your images.
Where can I find the GitHub repository for InstructIR?
The GitHub repository for InstructIR can be found at https://github.com/mv-lab/InstructIR.
